Introduction¶

Illumina is a strong-typed programming language with simple, clear logistics and elegant syntax. Apart from providing high-level abstractions, it allows metaprogramming and flexible modifications by providing a native interface.

Installation¶

Quick installation with brew:

brew install illumina

For a more detailed installation guide, check out Installation.

Quick Start¶

Create a program file hello.lux with the following code:

include io

func main :: void ():
    println("Hello World");

Compile and run the program with the following command:

illumina hello.lux

The console should print out Hello World!
